title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, cured pork, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted water.
While the pasta is cooking, crisp the guanciale in a pan.
In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and cheese with black pepper.
Drain the pasta, saving some of the pasta water.
Toss the pasta with the guanciale and the egg mixture. Add pasta water to create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 30 minutes.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
In a large pan, cook the crushed tomatoes and spices until thick.
Stir in the heavy cream and grilled chicken. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a variety of fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Whisk together the soy sauce, ginger, garlic, and cornstarch.
Heat a wok or large pan with oil.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and cook until it thickens.
Serve immediately over rice or noodles.

title: Classic Beef Burger
summary: A juicy grilled beef patty served in a toasted bun with fresh lettuce, tomato, and onion.
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, and onion for topping
instructions: Divide the ground beef into four equal patties.
Season generously with salt and pepper.
Grill the patties to your desired doneness.
Toast the burger buns.
Assemble the burgers with your favorite toppings and serve.
